summary: Texture replacer for male and female elven armor. Female armor changed to be a bit more revealing.
descriptionHtml:
AURABEAT\'S Revealing Black Elven Armor

Textures based on kevinwastaken\'s black textures

DESCRIPTION

This mod replaces the elven armor texture for a black version for both male and felmale, it also makes teh female version a bit more revealing. I originally created this when I started playing my first stealthy character a few weeks ago. I hope you enjoy, also let me know what you think.   

INSTALLING

Once you have downloaded and extracted the mod, simply place the folder named \"textures\" and \"meshes\" into your Skyrim \"Data\" folder. For most of you, this will be: 

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

UNINSTALLING

To uninstall, simply enter the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory, then enter \"textures\\armor\" and \"meshes\\armor\" then delete the folder named \"elven\".

PLEASE NOTE

This mod replaces the texture of elven armor, so as long as this mod is installed you will not see the original version in game.
author: Aurabeat
